ADS_STATION.content1: Simple yet powerful, Splice makes it easy to create fully customized, professional-looking videos on your Phone.
ADS_STATION.content2: Bring your photos to life and create slideshows with pan and zoom effects.
ADS_STATION.content3: Just tap to trim clips, adjust transitions, add slow motion effects and more to create beautiful videos you’ll love to share. It’s never been easier to edit like a pro on the go.
ADS_STATION.content4: Automatically sync your video to the beat of the music.
ADS_STATION.content5: Add amazing effects: glitch, chroma, vintage, and lots more.
ADS_STATION.content6: Add title slides, text overlays and a custom outro.
ADS_STATION.content7: Imagine the performance of a desktop editor, optimized for your mobile device.
ADS_STATION.content8: Apply filters and adjust background colors, orientation and more.
